title: Lynda.com - Office for Students
description:
Microsoft Office isn't just for the workplace. It works great in the classroom too. Students can use it to produce better quality work and save time inside and outside of classÃ¢â‚¬â€and maybe even impress their teachers along the way. Join author and educator Aaron Quigley as he teaches you the basics of using Office, whether you're a KÃ¢â‚¬â€œ12 or college student. Learn how to create professional looking documents and presentations, use Excel to track lab results or loan payments, manage email with Outlook, and more. Aaron also shows how to use Office to manage important life skills, like budgeting and time management.

Are you a teacher? Try our companion course, Office for Educators.
Topics include:

Creating assignment templates
Tracking changes and adding notes
Creating bibliographies and citations
Presenting in PowerPoint with SlideShare
Using Excel to manage data
Keeping school and personal email organized in Outlook
Setting up a calendar
Using SkyDrive to back up papers and assignments
